============
Installation
============

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

Dependencies
-------------

Academic Schrondinger (https://www.schrodinger.com/freemaestro)

Rdkit (http://www.rdkit.org/)

Env variables
--------------

export PELE='/path/to/PELE/folder/'

Python Path
------------

set export PATH=/path/to/PELE-1.5_mpi/:$PATH'

set export PATH=/path/to/mpirun/:$PATH'
